column5: Welcome home to your casita in a quiet corner of downtown Alpine! Enjoy your private porch and yard and walk to the Amtrak Station, restaurants, bars, music venues, Sul Ross State University, parks, grocery stores, and much more.   Amenities include one bedroom, a convertible futon couch, one bathroom, a full kitchen, and a dining area. Accomodates up to 4 people.   Stay connected with High Speed WiFi and HD cable.
